source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: How to Paint Pomegranates in Watercolor
items.headline: Multiple Step by Step Painting Tutorial. From the very first lesson, you'll be creating on your own.
objectives_summary: Multiple Step by Step Painting Tutorials.
My painting tutorial offer a clear and systematic approach to painting the subject matter.
Supply list to help you choose what’s best for you and your painting.

items.title: Sewing Basics
items.headline: All you need to know to do a project
objectives_summary: How to thread your machine
How to finish an edge three separate ways
Different stitches and what they're used for

items.title: Plant Drawings and Illustrations in Garden Design
items.headline: For a Garden Plan or Garden Design Schemes
objectives_summary: You will improve your drawing skills, enhance your design skills and learn new techniques to improve your knowledge in art and design

items.title: Palette knife - Painting a realistic rose impasto from basic

visible_instructors.name: Julia
visible_instructors.title: Julia Grechkina
visible_instructors.job_title: Palette knife artist. Impasto technique for the beginners.

items.headline: Easy steps to paint with a palette knife. Basic of impasto technique from basic to complex
objectives_summary: Oil painting
Oil impasto
Palette knife technique

items.title: Abstract Animal Painting Course

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Break away from rigid art and have some fun creating expressive animal art
objectives_summary: Various ideas for painting abstract style animals
Make your own collage paper
Gestural drawing to loosen up and connect with subject

items.title: Let's make a stuffed fox (jointed fabric doll)
items.headline: Sew with with me a jointed plush doll
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn to build a stuffed fox with joints

items.title: BEGINNERS GUIDE TO GEODE RESIN ART
items.headline: Easy to follow along directions to make a pink mini geode with Artist Agnes Rup.
objectives_summary: Basics of Geode Resin Art

items.title: Make your own planter | Woodworking for beginners
items.headline: Learn how to build a 30cm x 30cm wooden planter | DIY skills for the complete beginner
objectives_summary: Build a simple 30cm x 30cm wooden planter
Develop basic DIY skills
Build something beautiful for your garden that you can be proud of :-)

items.title: Sunflowers with Watercolour

visible_instructors.title: Julie Ombré
visible_instructors.name: Julie
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor Illustrator. Bc. of Architecture and Fine Arts.

items.headline: Create bright and Impressive illustration in summer bright colours
objectives_summary: Learn how to create impressive watercolour sunflowers in different techniques.
Discover basic difference between three types of paper.
Learn to use properties of paper and water in your artwork.

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 5: Drawing 3/4 Figures
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw figures in various 3/4 poses

items.title: Развиваем навыки рисования: Рисуем, не смотря на лист

visible_instructors.name: Anna
visible_instructors.title: Anna Yurchenko
visible_instructors.job_title: Customer service, process and service management expert

items.headline: В этом курсе мы нарисуем смешного и непосредственного кота с ярким характером!
objectives_summary: Необычная техника рисования "вслепую"
Способ создания единого рисунка из двух- трех вариантов
Способы "обогащения" рисунка: цвет и тон

items.title: Paper Mosaic Collage Dog Portraits
items.headline: Make a paper mosaic portrait of your dog
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to create a paper mosaic collage dog portrait

items.title: Learn drawing with simple cartoon animals
items.headline: Learn simple drawing techniquies and how to use rhymes to make engaging arts and crafts activities for your family
objectives_summary: Learn simple cartoon drawing with shapes
Learn how to tell stories through rhymes
Have fun creating stories around the drawings

items.title: Spring Blossoms Motifs in Watercolor [English]

visible_instructors.name: Ion
visible_instructors.title: Ion Sheremet
visible_instructors.job_title: Painting Tutorials in English / Malerei Tutorials in Deutsch

items.headline: We paint four different spring motifs with flowers, blossoms, landscape and cityscape
objectives_summary: How to properly handle watercolor paint and paint beautifully
Create different spring blossoms motifs in watercolor
Paint a bird and cherry blossoms in watercolor

items.title: Realistic Pencil Drawing Course: Art of Realistic Eye Draw

visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist

visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist

items.headline: Learn How to Draw Realistic Old Eye with Colored Pencil. Drawing and sketching with Colored Pencil  is a Cool Art
objectives_summary: students are expected to be able to recognize color and analyze skin color from the images and also know how to mix colors
They learn about the color of skin and how to create volume in drawing of wrinkled skin
Students learn some tools like cutter in drawing the tissues of the skin.

items.title: The Basic Woodworking Kit
items.headline: The set of tools, accessories and supplies needed by all woodworkers.
objectives_summary: the essential tools and their uses
what basic accessories are needed
what supplies you should always have on hand
